ai.summary: A gentle 3.7 km heritage trail through Lochgelly in the UK, designed for easy walking and accessible to families. The route follows mostly flat, well-surfaced paths with light urban sections, highlighting local history and points of interest along the way.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat to gently undulating urban pavements, compact gravel paths, and towpath-style sections. Some areas may have uneven paving and curb edges. Suitable for strollers on most parts; check for seasonal mud after rain.
ai.safety_notes: - Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. - Be mindful of street crossings and busy intersections; use marked crossings. - Watch for cyclists on shared paths and other pedestrians. - In UK weather, conditions can change quickly; bring waterproofs and sun protection as needed. - Keep children close and supervise at all times.
recommended_gear: Layered clothing for varying weather (hat and gloves if cold)
ai.best_seasons: All year, with the most pleasant conditions typically from late spring to early autumn.

seo.title: Lochgelly Heritage Trail - Easy 3.7 km Walk in Lochgelly, UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the Lochgelly Heritage Trail, a gentle 3.7 km loop in the UK. Perfect for families and casual walkers, featuring flat terrain and local history highlights.
seo.h1: Lochgelly Heritage Trail: Easy 3.7 km Walk
